testcase.brief: Acounting server failover from primary to backup
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: -config a radius server -config a ssid with 802.1x support -config a primary backup1,backup2 radius accounting server, they are unreachable -config a backup3 radius accounting server on ssid, this server is available -active this ssid
Test Procedure: -check the radius accounting servers bind to this security-object, 'sh aaa' to make sure, result 1 -client connects to ssid,check the debug, '_debug auth info', result 1 -after about several minutes, check the status of the STA

step.desc: -config a radius server -config a ssid with 802.1x support -config a primary backup1,backup2 radius accounting server, they are unreachable -config a backup3 radius accounting server on ssid, this server is available
step.telnet: -v "clear log all" -v "security-object autoap" -v "security-object autoap default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "security-object autoap security protocol-suite wpa2-aes-8021x" -v "security-object autoap security aaa radius-server primary ${pub.radius1.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "security-object autoap security aaa radius-server accounting primary 1.1.1.1 shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "security-object autoap security aaa radius-server accounting backup1 2.2.2.2 shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "security-object autoap security aaa radius-server accounting backup2 3.3.3.3 shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "security-object autoap security aaa radius-server accounting backup3 ${pub.radius1.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}"

step.desc: config ssid and bind it to interface ,open debug mode
step.telnet: -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object autoap" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "user-profile normal qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id 1 attribute 1" -v "interface wif0 radio channel 1" -v "_debug auth all"

step.log-match: -i " Sending RADIUS message to accounting server ${pub.radius1.ip}"
